content.question: The function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is defined for all <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> in the interval <math alttext="3 is less than x, which is less than 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements, if true, implies that <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 5, of, f of x, equals 12" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: There exists a function <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with <math alttext="f of x less than or equal to, g of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>≤</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="3 less than x, less than 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 5, of, g of x, equals 12" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

There exists a function <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with <math alttext="g of x less than or equal to, f of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>≤</mo><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="3 less than x, less than 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 5, of, g of x, equals 12" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

There exist functions <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with <math alttext="g of x less than or equal to, f of x, less than or equal to, h of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>≤</mo><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>≤</mo><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="3 less than x, less than 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 5, of, g of x, equals 11" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>11</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 5, of, h of x, equals 13" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mi>h</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>13</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

There exist functions <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with <math alttext=" g of x less than or equal to, f of x, less than or equal to, h of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>≤</mo><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>≤</mo><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="3 less than x, less than 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 5, of, g of x, equals, the limit as x approaches 5, of, h of x, which equals 12" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: There exist functions <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with <math alttext=" g of x less than or equal to, f of x, less than or equal to, h of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>≤</mo><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>≤</mo><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="3 less than x, less than 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 5, of, g of x, equals, the limit as x approaches 5, of, h of x, which equals 12" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
